#summary How to set up Copymark2.

= Prerequisites =
 * [http://www.python.org/download/ Python 2.6 or 2.7]
 * *Windows users:* [https://sourceforge.net/projects/pywin32/ Python for Windows extensions]

= Download Copymark2 = 
 * Get the [http://code.google.com/p/copymark2/downloads/list latest release].
 * Extract the Copymark2 directory to your system.
